column5: Hey so most here don't probably know me, but I got back from the hospital today and too excited not to make a post.  So my wife's water broke on Monday evening and she had to endure a very long labour which ultimately ended in a C-Section wednesday morning @ 3:08AM.  The baby was just getting too stressed after such a long journey, but I feel truely blessed.  This was the most emotional, satisfying and undeniable love that I've felt in my life.  Here's my new son Jackson, born Aug. 19th - 6lbs 6oz:
Congratulations to both of you Governator Memories of a life time for sure! Leechman
Congratulations Brother!! You've just joined the worlds greatest fraternity. Don't tell Misfish though he says there isn't enough parking in Barrie as it is. Well done to you and your Mrs. Jim
Congratulations to you and your new family.  Now hang on for dear life. It's a wild ride you've just hopped on, and it lasts, at least, 20 years.

So much fer yer fishing time. Now'll you'll be spending time in arenas and ball parks, spending the money you used to spend on fishing gear on skates, sticks, pads and little teeny jocks. Your beer money is now designated for registration in hockey, baseball, soccer and power skating, but that's all right cuz you won't have time to drink beer any more. You'll be driving kids to games - everywhere.  And you know the funny part is that - YOU'LL LOVE EVERY SECOND OF IT.  Congratulations Pops.  JF
Congrats!    Best things to ever happen to me, except when the oldest hit me in the    earlier
Welcome to the club! It's the best thing in the world! Better than reeling in a 6.6 Lbs bass
The pain we fathers go through waiting.   Congrats to all.     LMAO Been there too,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,many times.LOL
welcome to the club! my son was born 11 weeks ago...it's amazing how quick they develop (he's already 16 lbs!) this is what he does when i ask him if he wants to go fishing!
Fantastic news! Congratulations all around. I have a boy five and a girl two. I wouldn't trade them for all the tea in China. It can be tough at times, but it's all worth it. Cheers, Kenny G.

In about 14 years you will be in one of the most joyous times of your life. I have a house full of teens, and I have never had so much fun in all my life. That being said, don't forget that your wife is who you will spend your life with, don't forget her. I still remember sitting in a rocking chair a puddle of tears at my feet holding on to my newborn daughter for the first time. Welcome to the club and congrads!
Congratulations.....  wtg.....  wooohooooo,......  where is his fishing rod ?
Congrats Dude...to YOU and the MRS!!!  Good lookin' kid.... Who knew you had it in ya?

Congratz Dad welcome to the club I know you will here this 1,000,000 times over but it is true they grow up fast and enjoy every minute of these days.  I hope mom is also doing well that sure sucks putting in all that time them have to get the knife out I cant wait for the fishing reports with the new family.
Congratulations.  From the pic, he's already thinking of his first bass.  Glad everyone is doing great.
